c:atomType.name: BoxLayoutMode
c:atomType.c:documentation: The arrangement of boxes within the same category band.

c:atom.name: Grouped
c:atom.c:documentation:
Multiple boxes within the same category band are sized and distributed horizontally to fit the width of the category band.
The space between boxes of the same category is given by the boxSizeRatio option.

c:atom.name: Overlapped
c:atom.c:documentation: Every box having the same category is horizontally placed in the center of the category band, and, generally, overlaps.
